example: Remove the [MPSC]{REG} from the [splenic vein]{REG} and the [IVC graft]{REG} on the [IHIVC]{REG}
Transfer the [solution]{REG} with {pasteur pipette}[Device] into the [vials]{Container}
The experiment requires adding [50mL of distilled water]{Volume} to the mixture of [200mM glucose solution]{Concentration} and [20mL of citric acid]{Volume}.
Measure the [absorbance at 450nm]{Length} of the sample and calculate the [concentration of the protein]{Concentration}.
Maintain the reaction temperature between [37°C and 40°C]{Temperature} throughout the incubation period.
